SummaryEnglish: In 1992, a pandemic of viral encephalitis shook the world. The medical technology that saved humanity evolved into "Your Forma"—an invasive information device implanted into the brain. In this world where every sight, sound, and even emotion is recorded, investigating major crimes means diving into the collective data, a job reserved for special detectives called "Electronic Investigator." Echika Hieda, a prodigious "Electronic Investigator" assigned at an astonishingly young age, stands isolated by her exceptional talent. Her newly assigned partner is Harold, a blonde, blue-eyed humanoid "Amicus." Together, this unrivaled duo will expose every hidden secret.

1.SummaryEnglish: The main suspect in a recent assault case turns out to be Harold. However, during Harold's interrogation, someone else attacks his flatmate, Darya. Echika "Brain Dives" into Darya's "Your Forma" where she sees the attacker's face—which is identical to Harold's.

2.SummaryEnglish: While interviewing Lexie, Echika receives a report about the ongoing investigation. It only strengthens her suspicions towards Harold. Echika decides to get to the bottom of this case, but shortly after, something unexpected happens to her.

3.SummaryEnglish: It seemed like the investigation had advanced after apprehending Furman, but instead the case ends up taking a new turn. After further deductions, Echika and Harold arrive at a place where…

4.SummaryEnglish: When Echika discovers Furman's true intentions, she learns a shocking truth about Harold.

5.SummaryEnglish: Echika takes illegal medication to prevent Harold from reading her face and discovering the shocking revelations Professor Lexie has made about the Laws of Respect, but Echika soon pays the price for her efforts with a decline in her cognitive performance.

6.SummaryEnglish: Echika and her team found the spot where E's followers meet up. Bigga, who's helping with the investigation, can't contain her shock when she sees a certain person there.

7.SummaryEnglish: The forces of evil hadn't stopped with the explosion at Totoki's apartment, they've also been creeping up on Echika. Once again, she finds herself in danger, and Harold takes on the taboo…

8.SummaryEnglish: Cyber-Inspector Echika and Assistant-inspector Harold once again partner up. Thanks to Harold's strategy, the real villain has finally come to light, but behind the culprit lies an unexpected truth.

9.SummaryEnglish: The time has come to reveal Harold's past. Once a wandering, lost Amicus, Harold was taken in by Sozon and began working alongside him as a detective. But then a gruesome case that would later be known as "The Nightmare of Petersburg” shook their world...

10.SummaryEnglish: After receiving an incomprehensible report from Totoki, Echika, and Harold head to the municipal police to find out the truth. It turns out that the report was about a phone call from someone who was never supposed to be able to reach them…

11.SummaryEnglish: Echika and Harold grow more and more suspicious upon learning that Abaev was the one who received the digital clone requested by Elena. At the same time, another incident once again mimicking the "Nightmare" takes place. The victim this time turns out to be someone completely unexpected.

12.SummaryEnglish: Harold and Bigga notice what all the victims from these attacks have in common from the message Echika left behind. They identify who and where the culprit is, and rush to rescue the abducted Echika, but…

13.SummaryEnglish: It's time for Harold and Echika to confront each other. Echika tries to reason with Harold, who's burning with the desire for revenge. In the end, Harold comes to a decision, and―
